Others: The Los Angeles Angels and the Chicago White Sox are set to play on September 26, 2024, at Guaranteed Rate Field.
Chris Flexen and Tyler Anderson are the starting pitchers for the Chicago White Sox and Los Angeles Angels, respectively.
The betting odds for the game are Chicago White Sox +120 and LA Angels -141.
The game will be broadcast on FSW and NBCSN.
The Angels lost the first three games of their series against the Houston Astros before winning the fourth game.
In the opener versus the Sox, the Angels took a 3-2 loss.
The White Sox took a sweep versus the San Diego Padres in their last series, losing 3-2, 6-2 and 4-2.
Andrew Vaughn, Andrew Benintendi, Yoan Moncada, Tyler Anderson, Taylor Ward, Mike Trout, Luis Rengifo, and Anthony Rendon are some of the key players mentioned in the article.
